response.overview: Siblings Wednesday and Pugsley Addams will stop at nothing to get rid of Pubert, the new baby boy adored by parents Gomez and Morticia. Things go from bad to worse when the new "black widow" nanny, Debbie Jellinsky, launches her plan to add Fester to her collection of dead husbands.
response.tagline: The family just got a little stranger.
response.title: Addams Family Values

titles.title: Familien Addams – og synet på livet
La Famille Addams 2, Les Valeurs de la famille Addams
Die Addams Family in verrückter Tradition

results.name: Gomez teaches Uncle Fester How To "Romance" A Lady
